alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:50PM EST until February 22 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are forecast to remain at or below freezing this evening. This will result in additional ice accumulations, mainly on elevated surfaces. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
